description: Hidden stems (藏干) extraction table based on SKY_LIZARD fortune app standard
source: SKY_LIZARD Fortune App v10.4 - jijanggan table
note: This mapping represents the actual hidden stems used in production Korean fortune-telling applications

usage_notes.order: Primary hidden stem listed first, secondary and tertiary follow
usage_notes.strength_calculation: First stem typically has highest weight in root/seal scoring
usage_notes.compatibility: Matches production Korean Saju applications - use this for user consistency
